description: Up to three substance problems are reported for each admission so percentages do not total to 100.  Only includes data from state-supported treatment programs.  Data is by state fiscal year (SFY) which runs from July 1 - June 30.

metadata.description: Up to three substance problems are reported for each admission so percentages do not total to 100.  Only includes data from state-supported treatment programs.  Data is by state fiscal year (SFY) which runs from July 1 - June 30.

name: Substance Problems among Admissions to Maryland State-Supported Alcohol and Drug Abuse Treatment Programs, SFY 2008-2012
